ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::Overview###Small
ConfigItem.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a change list.

ConfigItem.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a template list.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###317-ITSMChangeAdd
ConfigItem.Description: Module to show a link to create a change from this ticket. The ticket will be automatically linked with the new change.

Hash.Item: Create a change from this ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###318-ITSMChangeAddFromTemplate
ConfigItem.Description: Module to show a link to create a change from this ticket. The ticket will be automatically linked with the new change.

Hash.Item: Create a change (from template) from this ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###010-History
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###020-Print
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###030-Edit
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###040-InvolvedPersons
ConfigItem.Description: Presents a link in the menu to show the involved persons in a change, in the zoom view of such change in the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Change involved persons of the change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###050-WorkOrderAdd
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a workorder in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Add a workorder to the change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###055-WorkOrderAddFromTemplate
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a workorder in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Add a workorder (from template) to the change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###060-Conditions
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the conditions of a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Edit the conditions of the change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###070-Link
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a change with another object in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Link another object to the change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###080-MoveTimeSlot
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows moving the time slot of a change in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###090-Template
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows defining a change as a template in the zoom view of the change, in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###100-ChangeDelete
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a change in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###110-ChangeReset
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to reset a change and its workorders in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the workorder zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###010-History
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###020-Print
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###030-Edit
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###035-Take
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows taking a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: [% Translate("Take Workorder") | html %]: [% Config("ITSMWorkOrder::Hook") %] [% Data.ChangeNumber | html %] - [% Data.WorkOrderNumber | html %]

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###040-WorkOrderAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows changing the workorder agent, in the zoom view of such workorder of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Set the agent for the workorder.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###050-Report
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows editing the report of a workorder, in the zoom view of such workorder of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###060-Link
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a workorder with another object in the zoom view of such workorder of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Link another object to the workorder.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###080-Template
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows defining a workorder as a template in the zoom view of the workorder, in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###090-WorkOrderDelete
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a workorder in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: [% Translate("Delete") | html %] [% Config("ITSMWorkOrder::Hook") %] [% Data.ChangeNumber | html %]-[% Data.WorkOrderNumber | html %]

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMChangeManagement
ConfigItem.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###ITSMChange
ConfigItem.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked Changes widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only Change attributes are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###ITSMWorkOrder
ConfigItem.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked Workorder widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only Workorder attributes are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

ConfigItem.Name: DynamicField::EventModulePost###100-UpdateITSMChangeConditions
ConfigItem.Description: DynamicField event module to handle the update of conditions if dynamic fields are added, updated or deleted.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::ChangeSearch::MirrorDB
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the change search and the workorder search functions could use the mirror DB.

ConfigItem.Description: DynamicField object registration.

ConfigItem.Description: DynamicField object registration.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::CacheTTL
ConfigItem.Description: Cache time in minutes for the change management. Default: 5 days (7200 minutes).

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::ToolBar::CacheTTL
ConfigItem.Description: Cache time in minutes for the change management toolbars. Default: 3 hours (180 minutes).

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Types of tickets, where in the ticket zoom view a link to add a change will be displayed.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::RestrictTicketTypes::Groups
ConfigItem.Description: Only users of these groups have the permission to use the ticket types as defined in "ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes" if the feature "Ticket::Acl::Module###200-Ticket::Acl::Module" is enabled.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::CounterLog
ConfigItem.Description: Logfile for the ITSM change counter. This file is used for creating the change numbers.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Hook
ConfigItem.Description: The identifier for a change, e.g. Change#, MyChange#. The default is Change#.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::StateLock::AllowEndStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if reachable (as defined by the state machine) change end states should be allowed if a change is in a locked state.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::State::Signal
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the signals for each ITSMChange state.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Category::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default value for the category of a change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Impact::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default value for the impact of a change.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Attribute::CompareValue::FieldType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the field type of CompareValue fields for change attributes used in AgentITSMChangeConditionEdit. Valid values are Selection, Text and Date. If a type is not defined, the field will not be shown.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Hook
ConfigItem.Description: The identifier for a workorder, e.g. Workorder#, MyWorkorder#. The default is Workorder#.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::StateLock::AllowEndStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if reachable (as defined by the state machine) workorder end states should be allowed if a workorder is in a locked state.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::State::Signal
ConfigItem.Description: Define the signals for each workorder state.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Type::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Default type for a workorder. This entry must exist in general catalog class 'ITSM::ChangeManagement::WorkOrder::Type'.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::ActualStartTimeSet::States
ConfigItem.Description: A list of workorder states, at which the ActualStartTime of a workorder will be set if it was empty at this point.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::TakePermission::List
ConfigItem.Description: A list of the agents who have permission to take workorders. Key is a login name. Content is 0 or 1.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::TimePeriod
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the period (in years), in which start and end times can be selected.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::HistoryOrder
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the change history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Acl::Module###200-Ticket::Acl::Module
ConfigItem.Description: This ACL module restricts the usuage of the ticket types that are defined in the sysconfig option 'ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes', to users of the groups as defined in "ITSMChange::RestrictTicketTypes::Groups". As this ACL could collide with other ACLs which are also related to the ticket type, this sysconfig option is disabled by default and should only be activated if needed.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMStateMachine::Object###Change
ConfigItem.Description: Sets up the state machine for changes.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMStateMachine::Object###WorkOrder
ConfigItem.Description: Sets up the state machine for workorders.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::SendNotifications
ConfigItem.Description: Defines whether notifications should be sent.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::TimeReachedNotifications###Frequency
ConfigItem.Description: Configures how often the notifications are sent when planned the start time or other time values have been reached/passed.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::TimeReachedNotifications###Hours
ConfigItem.Description: If frequency is 'regularly', you can configure how often the notifications are sent (every X hours).

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::ExchangeAxis
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if an agent can exchange the X-axis of a stat if he generates one.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagement
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementHistory
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes regarding change state updates within a timeperiod.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementChangesIncidents
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes regarding the relation between changes and incident tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementRfcRequester
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about the number of Rfc tickets a requester created.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementChangesPerCIClasses
ConfigItem.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes done for config item classes.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator
ConfigItem.Description: Selects the change number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the change number, the SystemID and the counter are used with SystemID.counter format (e.g. 100118, 100119). With "Date", the change numbers will be generated by the current date and a counter; this format looks like Year.Month.Day.counter, e.g. 2010062400001, 2010062400002. With "DateChecksum", the counter will be appended as checksum to the string of date plus the SystemID. The checksum will be rotated on a daily basis. This format looks like Year.Month.Day.SystemID.Counter.CheckSum, e.g. 2010062410000017, 2010062410000026.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator::AutoIncrement::MinCounterSize
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the minimal change counter size (if "AutoIncrement" was selected as ITSMChange::NumberGenerator). Default is 5, this means the counter starts from 10000.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###UserCreateWorkOrderNextMask
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the UserCreateWorkOrderNextMask object in the preference view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Configure which screen should be shown after a new workorder has been created.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###ChangeOverviewSmallPageShown
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the changes are shown) of the small change overview.

Hash.Item: Change limit per page for Change Overview "Small".

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###UserITSMChangeManagementTemplateEdit
ConfigItem.Description: Stores change and workorder ids and their corresponding template id, while a user is editing a template.

Hash.Item: Change and workorder templates edited by this user.
